thread.title: WHOA! Ram Charan To Dub For Salman Khan In Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
thread.title_full: WHOA! Ram Charan To Dub For Salman Khan In Prem Ratan Dhan Payo

title: WHOA! Ram Charan To Dub For Salman Khan In Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Updated: Tuesday, October 20, 2015, 10:13 [IST] 
Yes! what you just read is true. Ram Charan will be lending his voice for Salman Khan for his next outing Prem Ratan Dhan Payo , but for the Telugu version. 
Salman Khan already holds a strong market and huge fan base in most places of Telangana and a decent amount of revenue generates from this area for all his films. 
To further strengthen his market in both the Telugu states, Salman Khan now aims to release Telugu version of his next film Prem Ratan Dhan Payo and has requested his close friend, our Mega Power Star Ram Charan to dub for him in the Telugu version. 
It is known that the duo share a great bond and without any qualms Charan has reportedly took a call. He will dubbing for the film from today and likely to completely in 4-5 days. 
The film is slated to release on November 12 simultaneously with the Hindi version. In the past, Salman's Maine Pyaar Kiya released in Telugu as Prema Pavuralu and has run successfully for over an year and Prem Ratan Dhan Payo is expected to repeat the magic. Ram Charan To Dub For Salman Khan In PRDP 1/5 Mega 60 
Salman and Mega family share a special bond. His flew down to Hyderabad to grace Mega 60 for few hours just to make Chiranjeevi happy. Ram Charan To Dub For Salman Khan In PRDP 2/5 
Salman Khan at Charan's marriage ceremony. Ram Charan To Dub For Salman Khan In PRDP 3/5 Yevadu 
Salman Khan during Yevadu shoot. The bollywood super star took care of Charan's Bollywood debut and has helped him with even the food and stay in Mumbai. Guess its now Ram Charan's turn to pay off. Ram Charan To Dub For Salman Khan In PRDP 4/5
